thread.title: If you can wager on them, are fantasy sports gambling?
thread.title_full: Video: If you can wager on them, are fantasy sports gambling? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: If you can wager on them, are fantasy sports gambling?
text: Regulators in Nevada have become the first to rule that betting on daily fantasy sports sites like FanDuel and DraftKings are gambling. They have ordered the companies to cease operating in the state until they obtain gambling licenses. In our NewsHour shares of the day, a look at one student at Depauw University says he makes six-figures by betting on daily fantasy sports.
